articles.title: Health officials meet with Boise bar owners as downtown coronavirus cluster grows - KTVB.com
articles.description: The bar owners agreed to implement several measures to slow the spread of the virus, including asking customers to wear facemasks.
articles.content: BOISE, Idaho Officials from Central District Health met with nearly a dozen downtown Boise bar owners on Thursday, as the city grapples with a growing number of COVID-19 cases connected to the area's… [+3404 chars]

articles.title: Has Oregon's uptick in COVID-19 cases been linked to protests? - KGW News
articles.description: Oregon’s health officials say the number don’t back that up. But they still would like people to wear masks and keep their distance at protests.
